text: Pislya smutku Vin zislav vam zaspokiylyvyy son, yakyy torknuvsya chastyny z vas. Inshi zh buly zasmucheni dumkamy pro sebe, nespravedlyvo dumayuchy pro Allaha tak, yak dumaly u chasy nevihlastva. Vony hovoryly: «Chy mozhemo my shchosʹ vyrishuvaty v tsiy spravi?» Skazhy: «Sprava tsilkom nalezhytʹ Allahu». Vony khovayutʹ u svoyikh dumkakh te, shcho ne bazhayutʹ vidkryty tobi. Vony hovoryatʹ: «Yakby my spravdi shchosʹ vyrishuvaly, to nas otut ne vbyvaly b!» Skazhy: «Navitʹ yakby vy zalyshylysya vdoma, to ti, komu pryznacheno zahynuty, neodminno rushyly b do mistsya svoyeyi zahybeli, i Allah vyprobuvav by te, shcho u hrudyakh vashykh, shchob ochystyty te, shcho u sertsyakh vashykh!» Allah znaye te, shcho v sertsyakh
